title: Cardano Risk Profile Audit
description: Cardano stakepool operators face a variety of cybersecurity risks that they have not adequately prepared to defend against.
solution: Photrek will develop a Risk Profile Cybersecurity Audit for stakepool operators using NIST, ENISA, and ISO cybersecurity standards.
experience: The Photrek team includes international experts in cybersecurity and leaders in the Cardano stakepool operators community.
